Menus¶

Main Menu¶

This function will display the main menu after having establish a connection with mp

mainMenu.main_menu()[source]¶

Give the user the option to login as a customer or engineer

Customer Menu¶

First Menu for customer login at the begin of the customer bookings

customerMenu.authenticate(option)[source]¶

Authenticate the customer based on the username and password they enter.

customerMenu.customer_menu(customer)[source]¶

After customer login, this menu will be displayed with the option of locking the car (customer can sign back in) or return car (done with the booking session)

customerMenu.login_menu()[source]¶

There are two method to login for customer: Facial and Credential. If user press to login as customer by mistake, there is a escape option

Engineer Menu¶

This file work to run on the logic flow of the engineer which will unlock the car by bluetooth and other operation after the car is unlocked

engineerMenu.confirm_close_backlog()[source]¶

Display a confirmation with the engineer to close all backlog

engineerMenu.engineer_menu(engineer)[source]¶

This menu will displayed after AP detect engineer and unlock the car

The menu have 2 options: log the car (can still log back in) and scan QR code (lock the car and fix all the backlogs of that car)

engineerMenu.start_searching()[source]¶

Start searching for nearby bluetooth MAC addresses

Command line user interface¶

Class Util is use to handle simple function that are used accross all applications.

class model.util.Util[source]¶

This class holds all the functions used in this file.

static get_input(message)[source]¶

Get user input from the command line interface

static get_password(message)[source]¶

Specifically get a user password from the command line interface

static log_messages(message, parameters=None)[source]¶

This stores all the message types that form the menus in the command line user interface.
